descriptionHTML:
Google Play’s Carnaval - Festive updates you can’t resist

Do you dream of coaching a team of eleven stars hungry to be champions? New, free soccer club sim Top Soccer Manager puts sports fans like you in charge! Bid on and scout for top players, build and train a team with special skills, test tactics and formations against real opponents from around the world, and watch the match in live 3D simulation.

BEAUTIFUL GAMEPLAY
Top Soccer Manager's immersive 3D graphics and a powerful game engine bring your coaching fantasy to life. Watch stunning games play out in real time as you command your eleven players or bet on other matches in your league. Every goal is a step further on your journey to victory.

MANAGE & TRAIN YOUR SQUAD
As club head, you will test different formations, adjusting player line-up and tactics during play in response to your opponent. Pick a promising player to groom into a hero with special skills to score in the ultimate showdown. Build a team of champs to climb the leader board.

HUNT FOR STAR PLAYERS
Hunt for players to meet your team’s needs. Bid against other soccer managers to win golden boys in the market, recruit all-stars with an agent, or use scouts to find young hopefuls you can make into tomorrow’s legends. Transfer players who no longer fit your strategy.

RICH MULTIPLAYER EXPERIENCE
Face off against real opponents from around the world in league games. Give your team unique style with officially-authorized jerseys from Premier League, La Liga，Primeira Liga, Bundesliga, MLS. Grow your network of friends, exchange gifts, and grow team experience through friendly matches. Create or join a Soccer Association to gain more rewards.

For any issues or suggestions please contact us at https://gamegou.helpshift.com
developerAddress: 1-6-0102, Institute of Jinshang Jiayuan, 2 Huayuan Rd, Haidian District, Beijing ,China

descriptionHTML:
A bunch of Nasty Goats are on the loose! They've escaped their farm to go on a garbage-eating adventure. It’s your job to help them eat as much junk as possible before the farmer captures them and makes them go back to their boring home.

• Play a REAL game from Nickelodeon’s new TV show: Game Shakers!
• 5 different locations and one secret hidden area to find!
• 6 different goats to play and collect!
• 13 different power ups that help keep the goats feasting on junk!
• Collect 50 wearable items to customize the Nasty Goats!
• Crazy combos to add bonus points to your score!

Nasty Goats collects personal user data as well as non-personal user data (including aggregated data). User data collection is in accordance with applicable law, such as COPPA. User data may be used, for example, to respond to user requests; enable users to take advantage of certain features and services; personalize content and advertising; and manage and improve Nickelodeon's services. For more information regarding Nickelodeon’s use of personal user data, please visit the Nickelodeon Group Privacy Policy below. Our Privacy Policy is in addition to any terms, conditions or policies agreed to between you and Google. Nickelodeon and its affiliated entities are not responsible for Google's collection or use of your personal user data and information. Use of this app is subject to the Nickelodeon End User License Agreement. For users residing in the EU, Nasty Goats may include the use of persistent identifiers for game management purposes and installation of this app constitutes your permission to such usage of persistent identifiers for all users on your device.

Privacy Policy:
http://www.nick.com/info/privacy-policy.html

End User License Agreement:
http://www.nick.com/info/eula.html
summary: A bunch of Nasty Goats are on the loose!
title: Nasty Goats

comments: I wouldn't say that this bg app is difficult. It's currently limited in features. Skill expectations are low, but it's great to relax with. Love the "king for a day" feature, gives you a goal beyond just winning the current game.  It currently only supports single game mode which is fun for a quick game, but I prefer more of a challenge. So, I'm hoping that they'll add more features in the future. A 3-pt match with the use of doubling cube would be nice. Only drawback is that players don't appear to be very experienced and getting a game with a bet higher than 2600 is impossible, which makes this boring for me. Was just promised tournament mode if I update. I reinstall to latest version. Not even the promise of tournament mode now. Just lost a üåü for that. App lost another üåü. Tourney room is back. I'll be d***ed if I'm paying $5 to play it though.

Too many connectivity issues. For the past few days I keep disconnecting after the first round of every game. My internet connection is fine overall but I get an error message and lose the game AND coins. So then I have to watch a couple of 30s ads just to be able to play ONE game which also disconnects.

comments: Really sweet game, love the graphics. Just try and make the player press to complete the level so they have the option to gather more instead of forcing the end of the level. You should really add a price to this game, it's worth it, you did an awesome job! (At least 0.99)

Game art is beautiful and music is nice but a bit too loud. There should be a control in game settings for music volume and Little Red should get more power ups in later levels i.e. throw food to distract enemies and the black clouds should obscure enemy vision as well.

Mixed feelings here. Good graphics; however, the writer in me dislikes the use of red Riding Hood as a character, especially since it adds nothing to the gameplay. You could have easily created the game with a different character. Received game for free, would say it's worth 99 cents max. Enjoyed playing at first while watching Netflix, however, needed to focus more once a lot of creatures showed up.
Fun! Gets harder and harder. The story is cute but not much like the actual Little Red Riding Hood story, but it is still adorable. The graphics and music have me enchanted
Starts well, nice art design and music, simple effective controls, I find it gets repetitive by 2nd world. On level 18 I'm waiting forever for a chance to jump or I'm just not seeing it.
It's a nice enough game, but not my cup of tea. Rather difficult. I REALLY don't appreciate how loud the game ifevery time it starts. Sound sliders would be wonderful.

descriptionHTML:
TA Little Red Riding Hood is a Totally Amazing Twisted Adventure! By App Games.

Step into a bizarre fairytale world and set out on a Little Red Riding Hood adventure that only App Games can bring to life!

Hop from one dangerous island to the next by jumping at just the right moment. You needn’t worry. There are markers that lead the way to a successful jump. Be sure to grab all of the red apples and bonuses you can on your epic and twisted adventures.

The rich graphics, amazing game play, cool audio and visual effects, and superb backgrounds adds a depth to TALRRH not often seen in mobile video games of this type.

TA Little Red Riding Hood Features:

• Fantastic gaming
• Sweet jumping action
• Superior graphics and actions
• Excellent game effects that will amaze you
• Mesmerising game set in a twisted fairytale world
• Awesome backgrounds that will draw you in and blow your mind
• Very easy to understand and extremely engaging casual adventure game

TA Little Red Riding Hood is a spellbinding adventure game that you won’t want to miss out on. Share this all-ages family fun adventure game with your friends and family, they will thank you!

Be brave Little Red, be brave and succeed!


Game Reviews

"Games are a passion for me, and it’s clear that the developers of TA: Little Red Riding Hood feel the exact same way" - Android Headlines

Your charmingly unfair fox host will help you sabotage your rivals, but beware ‚Äì he‚Äôs helping them too!It‚Äôs easy to join in ‚Äì just use your smartphone or tablet as a controller to shake, tilt, swipe and snap. descriptionHTML:
Play a variety of quirky mini-games in Frantics™ on PlayStation®4 with this Frantics™ Companion App.

Challenge your friends and family in everything from crazy arena brawls to wacky races for up to four players. Your charmingly unfair fox host will help you sabotage your rivals, but beware – he’s helping them too!

It’s easy to join in – just use your smartphone or tablet as a controller to shake, tilt, swipe and snap. You may even find that the Fox calls you for secret missions...

Make sure your PS4™ console is connected to the same Wi-Fi network as your device and then you're ready to go. Simply follow the in-app instructions to connect.

Use this app to:
• Choose an animal to play as and shake your device to randomize it.
• Snap a selfie to show who’s who in the game.
• Play nice or sabotage other players in mini-games using your own screen.
• Receive texts and calls from the Fox to help you win.

This application can be used in the following languages:
English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Dutch, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Greek, Czech, Hungarian, Norwegian, Danish, Swedish, Finnish, Mexican Spanish and Brazilian Portuguese.

PlayLink for PS4™ titles are all about social gaming that everyone can enjoy. Pop a game into your PS4™, pick up your smartphone or tablet, gather around your TV and prepare for a refreshingly different experience – without the need for multiple DUALSHOCK®4 wireless controllers. playstation.com/playlinkforps4

This app turns your device into a controller. PS4™ console, Frantics™ and the Frantics™ Companion App are required to play. PS4™ console and Frantics™ are sold separately.

The following Terms of Use and Privacy Policy apply to the use of this app, depending on your country of residence:
playstation.com/legal/software-usage-terms/

PlayStation Mobile Inc.
2207 Bridgepointe Parkway
San Mateo, CA 94404
United States
summary: The companion app needed to play Frantics‚Ñ¢ on PlayStation¬Æ4.
title: Frantics

description: "The story begins in an abyssal fantasy world. The evil demon lord is finally defeated after a gruelsome battle with the heroes! Just when they were celebrating, a mysterious figure casted a spell and the heroes' abilities were gone. The heroes felt a disturbance in the world once again. They embark on their journey to defend the world once more!Game Speciality:Venture in "Genki Heroes" astonishingly vibrant fantasy battlegrounds. Embark on journey to defeat the evil lord !1) Job Classes: 4 Basic Job classes ; Swordman,Assasin,Gunslinger & Diviner. Every job has it perks. 2) PvP Battles: 1v1 Battle. There are also features like Multi Team PvP, 2v2 Team Battle and Chaotic Battle.3) Adventurous Missions: Interesting and diverse missions structure. Monsters drop loots in the mission. Players are able to choose different set of skills combo and item combination during the game.There are many more interesting content such as PVP Arena, Mystery Realm challenge, Trial Dungeon, Boss Dungeon, Enhancing Equipment, Drawing Heroes, Character and Heroes training, Pet system, marriage system and etc.Come join us now in Genki Heroes!

Design the wallpapers, place the furnishing like tables, chairs etc. Craft & design  items to make the most unique interior design ever!Use chat to pick up girls and boys (love story craft - you chat with computer bot - not real people!), date french girls or handsome boys! Take them to a romantic dinner in a french restaurant! Drive cars, motorcycles or just go to a theme park! Ride blocky animals, meet the people and have your own pet (from cat and dog to a parrot or elephant!) Visit cafes, pastry shops and monuments! Meet french artists! Visit the Paris Zoo and play with cute animals such as Panda or Coala! Become the citizen of a Square Paris! The city of art, love and awesome food! Pop in to a  french pastry shop, go for shopping to a shopping centre or arrange your own wedding in the most beautiful city of Europe! Crafting, building and exploration of city of love! No need for Paris guide!Craft & BuildSimply use blocks to create structures. Add or remove blocks to construct anything! Build a whole city! Over 300 different blocks are ready to unleash your creativity!Play MinigamesPlay minigames to enjoy your time in Paris even more. Pick up some girls and boys andhave fun! Remember - you are not talking to a real person only to a computer bot! You can have your virtual french boyfriend or girlfriend! Explore the infinite worldYou can travel anywhere you want! descriptionHTML:
Build your own blocky Eiffel Tower, Louvre and the Moulin Rouge! Meet the french people, visit museums and explore the capital of France! Build & Craft! Ultimate crafting games for boys and girls - only in Paris Craft!

Sandbox is a type of game, where you can explore the infinite blocky world! Create buildings using blocks and become the ultimate builder! Create a Paris from the scratch! Use blocks to build and unleash your creativity! Build anything! From a cottage house to a skyscraper!

Craft items and use them to decorate your apartment in Paris. Become an interior designer - the french style! Design the wallpapers, place the furnishing like tables, chairs etc. Craft & design items to make the most unique interior design ever!

Use chat to pick up girls and boys (love story craft - you chat with computer bot - not real people!), date french girls or handsome boys! Take them to a romantic dinner in a french restaurant!

Drive cars, motorcycles or just go to a theme park! Ride blocky animals, meet the people and have your own pet (from cat and dog to a parrot or elephant!) Visit cafes, pastry shops and monuments! Meet french artists! Visit the Paris Zoo and play with cute animals such as Panda or Coala!

Become the citizen of a Square Paris! The city of art, love and awesome food! Pop in to a french pastry shop, go for shopping to a shopping centre or arrange your own wedding in the most beautiful city of Europe! Crafting, building and exploration of city of love! No need for Paris guide!

Craft & Build
Simply use blocks to create structures. Add or remove blocks to construct anything! Build a whole city! Over 300 different blocks are ready to unleash your creativity!

Play Minigames
Play minigames to enjoy your time in Paris even more. Pick up some girls and boys andhave fun! Casino, dancing and singing rhythm minigames are waiting for you!

Meet the people
Use internal chat mode to pick up girls and boys, date and have fun! Remember - you are not talking to a real person only to a computer bot! You can have your virtual french boyfriend or girlfriend!

Explore the infinite world
You can travel anywhere you want! Use cars, metro, trains or even planes and helicopter! The world is infinite! You can ride horse or ride a bike - it’s your choice. Simply craft one of the items and use it!

Become an interior and exterior designer
Use one of over 200 items to prepare the most awesome interior design of your french mansion! Chairs, tables, drawers, desks! Design the kitchen, design the bathroom and become the legend of a interior design!

Paris Craft - one of the best crafting & building games of 2018. PLAY NOW!

description: Fasten your seat belt, get ready for an impossible ride on impossible track. Grab your favorite vehicle and start your car racing game now!Get groovy with high end sports cars on mega ramp. Sports cars not your choice? No worries, try muscle cars, mountain cars or you can even try huge trucks and demolition derbies monster vehicles. If you still looking for more fun  or ready to have great stunt driving then we also have train driving take off on mega ramp with high speed demolishing and crushing all other cars or trucks on the way.Take a real test of driving trains or cars on impossible tracks, jump off from a great speed to land and crush parking cars or trains on the ground to earn skill points.It's not a rooftop jump or normal stunt likely found in action games. You must take a high speed on the ramp, control the speed and jump off the track to destroy various monster vehicles. But be careful while car driving on slope as your car drifts like hell. Car drifting games are little easy to control but this simulator game will test your driving skills.
descriptionHTML:
Fasten your seat belt, get ready for an impossible ride on impossible track. Grab your favorite vehicle and start your car racing game now!

Get groovy with high end sports cars on mega ramp. Sports cars not your choice? No worries, try muscle cars, mountain cars or you can even try huge trucks and demolition derbies monster vehicles. If you still looking for more fun or ready to have great stunt driving then we also have train driving take off on mega ramp with high speed demolishing and crushing all other cars or trucks on the way.

Take a real test of driving trains or cars on impossible tracks, jump off from a great speed to land and crush parking cars or trains on the ground to earn skill points.

It's not a rooftop jump or normal stunt likely found in action games. You must take a high speed on the ramp, control the speed and jump off the track to destroy various monster vehicles. But be careful while car driving on slope as your car drifts like hell. Car drifting games are little easy to control but this simulator game will test your driving skills.
developerAddress: Redcorner Games, Financial District, Hyderabad, India.
recentChanges: Endless free fun games of mega ramp impossible stunts 2018. Enjoy the game!

title: Mega Ramp: Free Impossible Stunts

comments: The game was ok, I dont like it because the music kinda sounded like a mess, when I tapped it took forever to register, and forgot to add that the music sounded like a 2 year old trying to play an instrument. Background needed decoration and different colors than just yellow. It was also very glitchy and I deleted it in the first 30 seconds of me playing it. Forgot to add about music, it sounded like a mash of tons of people trying to sing and play instruments  and tons of animals making noise.

Nothing fantastic, those bouncing birds are from forever ago. The music in the background sounds like a 4 year old tried  to copy candy crush and crash bandicoot. The ads tho.. just too much. Made me uninstall immediately.
Great Game! I found what I was looking for! A breather from the same ol' same games out there...this birdy challenge cracks me up and keeps me on my beak, I mean toes! Lol...
Art theft. The artist already contacted them but the person who created the game claimed that it's different only because it's for the game when the animation is the exact same.

The art was copied from a artist called k√©k√©. You can find examples of their art on YouTube by k√©k√© and on Tumblr at k-eke. As far as I've seen, the examples they gave on Tumblr match up with the ones in the game. And when confronted the company refused to acknowledge it. Delete the game.
Art is stolen from a artist called K√©k√© (@Kekeflipnote on Twitter). I hope this app fails completely.

comments: Very fun BMX pump game. Seen a few reviews say it's gets impossible after level 3 when it becomes pay to win. I don't agree I've just reached level 8 in a few hours. If you ride bikes off road and understand how to pump you'll love it

Its way to hard to win and and the stats do nothing.  You have to be perfect and even then they fly by.  Still LOVE this game.  Just takes away the fun when you get left in the dust and you play the same lvl a million times hoping maybe one time you will be perfect.

The game is fun up until around the third level. After that it becomes near impossible to win any races without spending actual money to upgrade your bike. Had a lot of fun with it up until that point, but it's definitely not worth spending actual money on. Deleted the game after pay to win clearly became a necessity.

I expected the physics to be as flawless as Turborilla's MX games but they're not at all. Clunky, inconsistent physics leave you shaking your head and trying in vain to sum up what you did differently than the 100 previous attempts.

Awesome game!  Earning money is easy especially with online play and watching ads.  ONLY downfall is earning gold can be a pain,  seem like the only way to get gold is by beating a boss, buying gold with real cash and levelling up which can take some time.  Other then that it's a very addictive game if you love BMX that is.  Folloq me on instagram @evans_customz

Very good game but I wish there was a better way of getting gold without having to pay out of your hard working money. Since when did games start asking for cash? I would pay to buy the game but buying gold is stupid as hell.. either way very good game

descriptionHTML:
Mad Skills BMX 2 has finally arrived! See for yourself why Mad Skills games have been installed more than 40 million times worldwide, by action sports enthusiasts, professional athletes, and casual gamers alike. This is side-scrolling racing action as you’ve never experienced it, racing against people from across the globe on carefully designed tracks that will challenge your skills and — sometimes — your sanity.

- Amazing physics that combine elements of realism with arcade fun
- 7 different bikes that can be unlocked, upgraded, and customized
- Tons of rider customization options to help you achieve your own on-track look
- Dozens of hand-crafted tracks, with more added every single week for free
- Weekly Jam competitions carried over from the smash-hit game Mad Skills Motocross 2
- Competition with friends, people from your state or region, and international players
- Evil bosses to defeat — a Mad Skills first!


Mad Skills BMX 2 will get major developer support, ensuring tons of meaningful updates in the weeks, months, and years to come. We already have additional game modes in the works!

Learn tips and tricks by watching our weekly show, The Turborilla Show, at twitch.com/turborillagames!

comments: This app is really fun... but the multiplayer seems to only work the the first time you open the app after going back into the app which I've deleted and redownloaded twice it says there is and error I've reset my phone as well. So if this can be fixed this'll be an almost perfect app

Overall one of the most addictive and fun games I played for years. But dev team pleaaaaaaase! Create a multi open option for packs. I wouldn't even mind that you could for instance, apply a penalty for opening many packs at once like dice roll decrease on packs luck. But sometimes sitting at so many closed packs makes me wanna quit the game just for the sake of boredom, having to click 4 times to open, wait for the loading times and doing this over and over again. This ruins the gameplay a little for me. Regardless, easily one of the best games available in the play store. Extremely well done Dev team.

As an expirienced player i love the game, more the multiplayer than single. But i have encountered some recurring ploblems. The game crashes alot, i am offen timed out when wanting to pick a player becuase i have to 'wait for the opponent' for some reason. Also time times the opponent is timed out and the game freezes on the timed out screen, which happends frequently. Also for salty players who just quit at soon as they dont get the captain they want and leave, there are no repercussions in which their should be so that they dont have a perfect record. I love the game and it passes time but the problems make me only rate the game a 3 star rather than a 4 or 5.
- Multiplayer doesnt work - The claim weekly reward stays at 0% forever. - There arent any sounds or music, and that is bad! Please fix! SONY xperia m2
The trading system is broke. Ive lost so many players due too trading. When i offer a trade accept and they get my cards/ money but i dont get what they offer!!!
The game was good. But now it just keeps freezing in on me and it stops all the the time. I try to do an sbc and it crashes and now I can't even open any type of packs because the app crashes.

descriptionHTML:
The new FUT 18 Draft Simulator by PacyBits is here, and our best game has gotten even better.

Draft the latest FUT players, build your squads, enter tournaments, and collect awesome rewards. Challenge other players and test your draft-building skills in the brand new Online Drafts. Become the best Draft player and build the greatest FUT 18 club in the world!

We will be adding many more amazing features all the time! So start building your club now, and stay tuned for much, much more.

descriptionHTML:
In this game, you control a small character, armed with a pickaxe and spear.
You are tasked with harvesting nearby resources with this pickaxe, such as wood and stone.
With these resources, you can then begin building your base, beginning with a Gold Stash.
With your Gold Stash built, start harvesting gold by placing Gold Mines.

Raise the gun, collect the resources, build the buildings. There are dozens of strategies on this area!

description: Core - this is a small lightning"ball" that will pull you in it‚Äôs world forever, will open for you cool, exciting offline games of a stylish interface! Download this offline game right now, press the start button, and the lightening ball‚Äôs "adventures" in the world of geometric shapes begin!MISSIONThis no Internet game is endless. The goal of the arcade Core is to put a personal record, and even to become # 1 among friends. And to complete a mission and to beat the record you need to fly as fast as possible, bend all obstacles on the way as quickly as you only can and to collect ALL the bonuses (glowing balls) that you only meet on your adventure.HOW TO PLAY?To bring a Core into a motion, it's enough just to tap on the screen. The more you press on the screen, the faster it flies.You need to make this luminous ball fly into the falling figure that rotates and fly of it out. Each figure has one free edge - the entrance to it, in the same time it‚Äôs exit, which will change it‚Äôs location with the figure rotations . Therefore, get close to the falling figure, when it is turned by the free edge down, and fly out of it when it turns the free edge up. All these manipulations should be done until the figure falls. And this will take just a second and even a half of a second, so you need to be really quick! You can not touch the figures!First you will face with simple triangles and squares, but the further you go, the harder the construction of figures of this no Internet  game are, and the harder it will be to overcome them. Sometimes neither one, nor two, but many figures will move towards you. For example, a combination of stars, or circles, or any other figures that not only rotate about their axis, but they also can move along a completely incomprehensible trajectory, may come upon you. In this case, you have nothing to do but look for the passages between them and as quickly as possible slip across. Just do not forget to collect bonuses - small lightening balls!Download the arcade CORE RIGHT NOW, but be careful, because you can become addictive to this game!
descriptionHTML:
Core - this is a small lightning"ball" that will pull you in it’s world forever, will open for you cool, exciting offline games of a stylish interface! Download this offline game right now, press the start button, and the lightening ball’s "adventures" in the world of geometric shapes begin!

MISSION

This no Internet game is endless. The goal of the arcade Core is to put a personal record, and even to become # 1 among friends. And to complete a mission and to beat the record you need to fly as fast as possible, bend all obstacles on the way as quickly as you only can and to collect ALL the bonuses (glowing balls) that you only meet on your adventure.

HOW TO PLAY?

To bring a Core into a motion, it's enough just to tap on the screen. The more you press on the screen, the faster it flies.
You need to make this luminous ball fly into the falling figure that rotates and fly of it out. Each figure has one free edge - the entrance to it, in the same time it’s exit, which will change it’s location with the figure rotations . Therefore, get close to the falling figure, when it is turned by the free edge down, and fly out of it when it turns the free edge up. All these manipulations should be done until the figure falls. And this will take just a second and even a half of a second, so you need to be really quick! You can not touch the figures!
First you will face with simple triangles and squares, but the further you go, the harder the construction of figures of this no Internet game are, and the harder it will be to overcome them. Sometimes neither one, nor two, but many figures will move towards you. For example, a combination of stars, or circles, or any other figures that not only rotate about their axis, but they also can move along a completely incomprehensible trajectory, may come upon you. In this case, you have nothing to do but look for the passages between them and as quickly as possible slip across. Just do not forget to collect bonuses - small lightening balls!

Download the arcade CORE RIGHT NOW, but be careful, because you can become addictive to this game!
summary: Tap the screen and join Core's adventures in the world of geometric shapes!
title: CORE

comments: Das Quiz bricht mitten drin ab und funktioniert nicht mehr, musste App schlie√üen und habe Fragen verpasst da bei Quizduell alle drei Fragen ja auf einen Haufen kommen, was √ºbrigens sehr nervt√∂tend ist und mir nicht gerade Lust darauf mach es √∂fter zu spielen. Und im gro√üen und ganzen h√§ngt die App sowieso sehr oft. Daf√ºr das ARD soviel Geld hat, sollte man meinen sie k√∂nnten eine wenigstens mehr oder minder funktionierende App erstellen lassen. Schlechteste Game App die ich je hatte. Hoffe nach den ganzen negativen Reviews wird daran irgendwann einmal was verbessert.
Live mitspielen funtioniert gar nicht

Bitte mehr Notifications, wenn man dran ist, bzw ne neue Frage kommt. Beim Duell kann man vor der Finalfrage nicht zur√ºckgehen, um sich den Spielstand anzusehen, h√§ufig bleibt die App auch h√§ngen....  Finde die App grunds√§tzlich gut, aber es gibt noch viele Kleinigkeiten und technische Probleme.
Es werden keine Fragen eingeblendet, wieder gel√∂scht.

Die App reagiert sehr zeitverz√∂gert, was noch das geringste Problem ist. Teilweise darf ich gar nicht mitraten, weil die Frage mir nicht gestellt wird, teilweise wird die Frage nicht Mal eine Sekunde lang eingeblendet und dann war sie wieder weg. Punkte werden mir erst gegeben wenn ich die App neustarte. Die 2 Sterne gibt es f√ºr die Idee und die Sendung. Die Umsetzung ist sehr schlecht, bitte √ºberarbeiten!   Edit: die angesprochenen Fehler habe ich jetzt nicht mehr bemerkt. Daf√ºr trat ein anderer auf: mir wurde die Frage gar nicht gestellt und sofort rot markiert und ich konnte nachgucken was die richtige Antwort war (ohne das die tv-show schon soweit gewesen w√§re). Nachdem ich die richtige Antwort wusste, wurde mir die Frage dann doch gestellt und ich konnte antworten. Punkte habe ich dann auch bekommen

Die App ist im grossen und ganzen gut. Allerdings sind Fragen zum Teil einfach verschwunden, bevor man √ºberhaupt die Antworten lesen konnte. Das ist sehr frustrierend besonders, wenn man die Arbeit weiss.

Neun App-Spieler erhalten bei  gewonnenem Spiel anschlie√üend sogar einen Teil des Preisgeldes ‚Äì ausgelost per Zufallsgenerator!Auch bei der ‚ÄûNDR Quizshow‚Äú im Sonntagabend-Programm des NDR Fernsehens kannst du mit der ARD Quiz App dein Wissen rund um Norddeutschland live unter Beweis stellen. descriptionHTML:
Die offizielle ARD Quiz-App

In der offiziellen ARD Quiz App findest du ein breites Mitspielangebot zu den beliebten Quiz- und Showsendungen der ARD.

Ganz neu ist das Modul zur Sendung „Quizduell“ im Vorabendprogramm des Ersten. Hier kannst du nicht nur live während der Show miträtseln, sondern mit deinen Antworten sogar das Studiogeschehen beeinflussen! Zusammen mit anderen App-Spielern bildest du nämlich das „Team Deutschland“. Gemeinsam mit dem Teamkapitän im Studio habt ihr die Möglichkeit, um den Tagessieg zu spielen. Neun App-Spieler erhalten bei gewonnenem Spiel anschließend sogar einen Teil des Preisgeldes – ausgelost per Zufallsgenerator!

Auch bei der „NDR Quizshow“ im Sonntagabend-Programm des NDR Fernsehens kannst du mit der ARD Quiz App dein Wissen rund um Norddeutschland live unter Beweis stellen. Vielleicht bist du ja sogar heller als die „Leuchte des Nordens“ im Studio?

Auch wenn die beliebte Quizshow „Wer weiß denn sowas?“ im Vorabend-Programm des Ersten nicht gesendet wird, kannst du mit dem entsprechenden Modul in der ARD Quiz App weiter Dein Wissen unter Beweis stellen. Stell dich den kniffeligen Fragen und fordere deine Freunde oder andere App-Spieler zu einem Duell heraus! Natürlich kannst du auch im Spiel gegen die TV-Teams antreten und dich mit Bernhard Hoëcker und Elton messen.

Bei den XXL-Ausgaben von „Wer weiß denn sowas?“ am Wochenende zur Prime Time im Ersten kannst du live mitzuspielen. Entscheidest du dich zu Beginn des Spiels für das richtige Gewinner-Team, kannst du mit etwas Glück sogar Geld gewinnen – und zwar den gleichen Betrag, den auch das Publikum im Studio erhält!

Viel Spaß beim Mitraten in der ARD Quiz App!
summary: Here you can find Mitspielangebote to quiz and show broadcasts on ARD

description: When Uncle George wills you an old farm, it is your time to step up your farming skills and turn an overgrown field into a flourishing business. Plant, harvest and crop your fields and take care of all your animals. Prove your business skills by selling your crafted goods on the organic market. Build all kinds of fields, stables or production buildings and decorate your farm with stunning decorations. Use your profits, so you can keep upgrading and expanding your farm until you become the greatest farmer far and wide! No matter if you help the villagers organize a  fairy tale festival, solve the mystery of UFO sightings, or get in the Christmas spirit. Are you ready to build the farm of your dreams? descriptionHTML:
When Uncle George wills you an old farm, it is your time to step up your farming skills and turn an overgrown field into a flourishing business. Plant, harvest and crop your fields and take care of all your animals. Prove your business skills by selling your crafted goods on the organic market. Build all kinds of fields, stables or production buildings and decorate your farm with stunning decorations. Use your profits, so you can keep upgrading and expanding your farm until you become the greatest farmer far and wide!

Live a happy life in the countryside and become close friends with all villagers - Benny, Tessa and all their jolly friends are waiting for you. Meet other farmers from all over the world and become a beloved member of the Big Farm: Mobile Harvest community. Join them in cooperatives. in which you support each other.

The harvest year is full of events - follow through the quests of the villagers and let the story of your own farm unfold. No matter if you help the villagers organize a fairy tale festival, solve the mystery of UFO sightings, or get in the Christmas spirit. Are you ready to build the farm of your dreams?

Features

❀ BUILD the farm of your dreams with a plenty of buildings and decorations
❀ JOIN the community and meet farmers worldwide
❀ HARVEST your favourite fruits, vegetables, and flowers
❀ PRODUCE organic foods and farm fresh goods
❀ MANAGE realistic production cycles
❀ TAKE CARE of your lovely animals and raise chickens, cows, and pigs

Take your new farm everywhere. What are you waiting for? Let's get started! Play Big Farm: Mobile Harvest now for free!

descriptionHTML:
Be a super agent and conduct a comprehensive investigation of the case. Many useful clues have been found and it's time for you come out with the whole truth. All the evidence proves that he is the criminal. Collect all evidence and bring the bad guys to justice. It's time to arrest him. Let's go!

Features:
1. OMG. Alan is coming here. He sneaked up on Eric and tried to destroy the evidence. Can he be any worse?
2. Was high school boy Eric injured in the fight? Give Him a head-to-toe health check.
3. Be a super agent and conduct a comprehensive investigation of the case.
4.Great. Many useful clues have been found. Mermaid Princess Mia scratched the kidnapper's arm when she struggled with him. Do the blood test to find the truth.
5. Collect all evidence and bring the bad guys to justice.
6. All the evidence proves that he is the criminal. It's time to arrest him. Let's go!
7. The bad days are over. The mystery kidnapper had been arrested and princess mermaid Mia can breathe again.
8. Good News. Your crush high school boy Eric asks you to hang out. Will he confess his feeling to you? So Excited about it!
9. Oh, no. The gossip girl Lily has just eavesdropped two sweethearts. She couldn't wait to share the gossip with her good friend Kim.
10. Kim is just spoiled and arrogant. How can she accept a boy she likes to date with other girl?

comments: Game is great, but every time you die (and that's really easy to do) you need to watch about 22 seconds of ads. Once i got a 15 second ad, but the skip time stayed constant and i had to watch the entire thing. The game also bugs you constantly about connecting your facebook account. So if you want to be able to play without interruptions constantly, you need to pay and connect to a facebook account.

Brilliant, innovative, addictive game BUT please reduce the number of ads. That's why this game is only averaging  3.5* and why I can only give it 4*. People will stop playing very quickly as it currently is. Just take it down to an ad break every end of run. Also a way to easily view all positions on the leader board would be nice. Otherwise the game itself is great.

I would have bought the ad free Version eventually, but it was so annoying even to get used to the game, that I gave up. If you want more people to buy the game you have to give them the opportunity to play without being interrupted every death. Your game can be the best ever but still no one will play it if they have to invest the same time in watching ads that they invest in playing the game.

Too many ads with a skip button that reduces ad time by 10 seconds. Literally, f off, dude. Can't play your game, I play for a minute and than watch an ad for half of that time. Unfair and boring. You almost don't get to play the game. Which is, btw, awesome

Visually satisfying, nice, fitting soundtrack and pretty innovative. One thing is that it's extremely packed with ads. One every round you play. Maybe dial it down a little?  Also, maybe add tail patterns...

Unshippable, mandatory ads after every failure, this enough gives it the rating it deserves. There are way better ways it implement ads that dont shove it in your face. Otherwise, I would recomend as a time killer

descriptionHTML:
Flow along an infinite horizon and challenge your Facebook friends in FLO. Roll your ball up and down hills to gain speed in this exciting, fast-paced infinite runner.

Use simple one-touch tap gameplay to travel as far as you can, achieve your personal best and connect with Facebook to see friends’ playing FLO, then challenge them to beat your high score!

Dodge deadly mine obstacles with one tap to flow through the horizon. Hitting a mine will reduce the speed of the ball, making it harder to beat your friends’ scores on the leaderboard.

★ Travel above the horizon to pick up speed as you roll down
★ Travel below the horizon to pick up speed as you roll up
★ Dodge the mines and flow through the horizon by tapping on impact
★ Tap and hold to glide past obstacles
★ Smash through score walls set by your Facebook friends
★ Losing momentum brings the Wall of Death ever closer. If it engulfs you, it’s game over

FLO is a beautiful game experience with music tracks by UK Hardcore act Fracus & Darwin.


Thank you for downloading this game from everyone at Rogue Games.

description: Ladybug Super Hero girl has to pass lots of evil crocs, spiders and dragons and also go through noir castles. You are Ladybug - the cool superhero girl!But be careful! Lots of dangers, enemies, troubles, obstacles, difficult traps and bosses are defending your way through the jungle, castles and wonder worlds.To finish the platformer game Super Ladybug will have to jump and run over many obstacles, fight and shoot against chibi ninjas, cruel crocs, hedgehogs, skeletons, leps, cats and many other monsters and dragons.Climb up huge miraculous bridges, mountains and stairs, fight against prehistoric enemies, avoid falling bricks, find hidden noir blocks and levels, collect coins, swim through dangerous seas, explore lot of challenging and addictive jungle worlds and lands and defeat all cruel bosses and enemies.This miraculous Jump and Run is an addictive old school arcade jungle adventure game!Exciting features of Ladybug Adventures:+ 4 different addictive worlds (miraculous land, crazy noir forest, egypt world and cave sphere) + 80 wonderful, well-designed, exciting and challening levels with slowly increasing game difficulty+ 8 awesome boss fights (angry scorpion, dangerous spider, bee cat golem and crocodile boss) in 8 different dark castles+ great number of power ups, bonus rounds, secret blocks and bonus items+ over 20 various, great animated enemies such as crocs, cats, frogs, spiders, monsters, dragons, snails and many more+ great mix between 2D and 3D graphics in very high resolution+ retro arcade music and old school sound effects+ perfect, intuitve super game control through retro console games control pad+ special skills hidden in destroyable blocks and bricks+ awesome gameplay reminding to retro classic dash games+ water and sea worlds - jumping, running, fighting AND swimming!+ try to unlock all achievements and to be number one of leaderboards!How to play Ladybug Adventures:+ click right or left on your control pad for moving ladybug super hero girl!+ down-button is for ducking and also to get to some bonus levels (under tree stumps)+ press B-button to make Super Ladybug jumping!+ press A-button AND right or left for running; press A and B together for a higher and wider jump!+ by eating an apple you will become Super Silver Ladybug, get magic powers and then be able to destroy bricks!+ by eating golden flowers you will become Super Golden Ladybug and be able to throw fireballs + ladybug also can swim sometimes - press A-Button multiple times to swim higher ... release finger from button to go down!Have fun with this cool new super adventure platformer tale game!
descriptionHTML:
Ladybug Super Hero girl has to pass lots of evil crocs, spiders and dragons and also go through noir castles. You are Ladybug - the cool superhero girl!
But be careful! Lots of dangers, enemies, troubles, obstacles, difficult traps and bosses are defending your way through the jungle, castles and wonder worlds.
To finish the platformer game Super Ladybug will have to jump and run over many obstacles, fight and shoot against chibi ninjas, cruel crocs, hedgehogs, skeletons, leps, cats and many other monsters and dragons.
Climb up huge miraculous bridges, mountains and stairs, fight against prehistoric enemies, avoid falling bricks, find hidden noir blocks and levels, collect coins, swim through dangerous seas, explore lot of challenging and addictive jungle worlds and lands and defeat all cruel bosses and enemies.

This miraculous Jump and Run is an addictive old school arcade jungle adventure game!

Exciting features of Ladybug Adventures:
+ 4 different addictive worlds (miraculous land, crazy noir forest, egypt world and cave sphere)
+ 80 wonderful, well-designed, exciting and challening levels with slowly increasing game difficulty
+ 8 awesome boss fights (angry scorpion, dangerous spider, bee cat golem and crocodile boss) in 8 different dark castles
+ great number of power ups, bonus rounds, secret blocks and bonus items
+ over 20 various, great animated enemies such as crocs, cats, frogs, spiders, monsters, dragons, snails and many more
+ great mix between 2D and 3D graphics in very high resolution
+ retro arcade music and old school sound effects
+ perfect, intuitve super game control through retro console games control pad
+ special skills hidden in destroyable blocks and bricks
+ awesome gameplay reminding to retro classic dash games
+ water and sea worlds - jumping, running, fighting AND swimming!
+ try to unlock all achievements and to be number one of leaderboards!

How to play Ladybug Adventures:
+ click right or left on your control pad for moving ladybug super hero girl!
+ down-button is for ducking and also to get to some bonus levels (under tree stumps)
+ press B-button to make Super Ladybug jumping!
+ press A-button AND right or left for running; press A and B together for a higher and wider jump!
+ by eating an apple you will become Super Silver Ladybug, get magic powers and then be able to destroy bricks!
+ by eating golden flowers you will become Super Golden Ladybug and be able to throw fireballs
+ ladybug also can swim sometimes - press A-Button multiple times to swim higher ... release finger from button to go down!

Have fun with this cool new super adventure platformer tale game!
summary: Super LadyBug is a new, super and fantasy game, play adventure and save cat noir
title: Super ladybug

description: What an amazing story and stunning features are provided by this horse game. It has a defined purpose that will motivate you to move further and accomplish all the required tasks in order to recover our princess sight back from the evil witch that stole it. This sad story must have a happy ending and you will be the one that will provide it. Her beloved stallion is actually the one that will go through all those difficult paths so if you want to handle this situation you have to empower her. Destiny, or as we like to call her, the bravest horse, is going to have an intense adventure and she needs to be ready for any trouble that might overcome. You have 5 items that will show you her condition and each one presents her state like sleeping, eating, being loved, using the toilet or the health of her hooves. All of them needs to be almost fulfilled so you could proceed with achieving the levels. The happiness could be gained by brushing or by playing those funny mini-games. This is one method to get money, but also to earn diamonds and money you could collect them from your trip and this is what exactly you are going to do when your horse's needs are complete. Go through each level to unlock the following one and try to find all those three crowns so you could finish your job. During the race, you have to take as many coins as you can because it will help you buy important things for Destiny, such as food. The game has instructions and every new move is going to be explained and you will see how easy is to learn the way it works. More than that your stallion is going to be rated for her performance during the race of each level, so do your best and earn the best star points. You've got to make it through all 100 levels that are in different lands and has particular challenges. Also, you will notice that we provided an interesting rage of horses from where to choose once you go deeper into the game. You could even customize your horse hair and all, but to make it more interesting we've given you the chance to arrange the stable as well. These and much more is about to welcome you in this complex game.

description: Mountain Assault Shooting ArenaReload Your Assault Gun, More Enemy Army Troopers are Coming.Welcome to a brand new shooting game of 2018. The enemy has swarmed in the jungle and are conducting offensive strikes against our country. The armed forces cannot engage with any full fledge frontline pvp battle. Because this could rage war between two countries. But this thing need to be tackled within no time to stop cover strike commando. The enemy has also build up hideouts and are attacking from behind. Now the strategic reply should be given from our side by our commando. For this, the high command has hired a commando to crush the enemy forces. You have to play the character of war strike commando. Your ultimate duty is to retaliate the enemy attack. The jungle is very dense with a lot of cover, so war strike commando needs to be very careful.The gameplay of this game is very thrilling. Players of every age will definitely enjoy with dozens of sequenced frontline pvp battle levels. The initial missions are very easy as compared to last ones. Because the difficulty level increases as you proceed more inside the war strike commando game. You are the only best man to conduct operation in a jungle swarming with hostile forces. There are different weapons in the armory that you can use in cover strike commando game. But only primary gun is available and you have to buy other stuff. The mission tasks are different in each mission of this covert ops commando game. This will definitely test your shooting skills to a whole new level. Furthermore, the gadget includes mini radar to show your position on the ground in this covert ops commando game. You will also get paid with cash on completing each mission. Spend it to buy new weapons, med packs and grenades to win cover strike commando game. You should be prepared every moment, because the enemy is battle hardened and well trained.The controls of this frontline pvp battle game are very easy. Even players of every age will enjoy their spare time with fun. The button placement is ideal in this war strike commando game. You have one section for movement and other to perform actions. The action buttons include fire, reload, change stance and miscellaneous to provide ease of playing this commando pvp shooting game. You can also have a strategic look via radar showing enemy positions. So paly more and enhance your experience in commando pvp shooting games.Best of Luck‚Ä¶! comments: Great concept for a game but good luck trying to play. Its already full of pay 2 win people and they don't let anyone else have a chance to to even do anything without them killing you. So basically, you don't pay, you don't play... it was fun the day i joined a new server though. Has slowly gone down hill and now a week later it's unplayable. Too many wallet warriors playing games these days. Just sad.

While this game can be very fun to play the and yes it is a pvp game there are HUGE downfalls to this. you get people who spend the most money bullying and controlling the servers making it a free pk etc problem with this is the ones who "control" the servers can't be killed so it can't be stopped. don't waste your time or money in the end the bullies and people who bully will make anybody who has spent money quit because it's a 'unbalanced' concept. it should be fixed and more balanced where if you are or have over 3mil power or more on somebody you can't pk that person. in the end you will lose more of a player base bc of this reason bc your cashers are running people off who may or may not have or will spend so less money for the devs if Yall don't do something to balance the pk issues.

Well if you like games that play them selves then this game is for you. 2 stars are for graphics and storytelling in game. I would rather play old Diablo 1 than this game, you have almost no control in game, everything is auto! Auto walk, auto battle, auto sell, auto quest, auto feed pet. The only thing that breaks auto-play is messaging other players and talking to npc. Just make the game a movie its more than halfway there.
The add for this on YouTube is just Diablo 3 gameplay..... Get your own stuff you are  of ripping of a game that people put real hard work into. In fact I feel I should tell blizzard :D

Not good if you want to play this game, there's always people trying to kill you if you interact with players with red on their name. Im trying to level up my character and some random people keep killing my character, you can't have a personal space while you trying to level up, I'm warning you, don't be decieved by the flashy trailer they'll do any for your wallet
Run of the mill mobile arpg. 3 classes, genderlocked. Has that over designed armor look that I detest.   Has auto combat and auto questing so that's good if you like that sort of thing. I don't.

descriptionHTML:
Experience an awe-inspiring Free MMORPG that lets you control actions in Real-time and embark through a vast fantasy 3D Open World!
Immerse yourself into a mmorpg universe of epic atmosphere and darkness through fast gameplay and amplified combat intensity! Meet friends around the world and create Parties to raid treacherous Dungeons or clash Real-time against rivals in the Arena and large-scale PVP Battlegrounds. Gear up stunning Armors, Wings and Mounts to fight against the evil on a Fantasy MMORPG Open World to bring back Glory. Upgrade and transform yourself from warrior to an unstoppable War God!
As the Darkness falls, only the Chosen survive…
Prepare yourself and Embrace the Darkness of Dark 3!

▶WORLDWIDE SERVERS
- The Action MMORPG – Dark 3 is now available for 165 countries! Party with friends from all over the globe and conquer enemies in the immersive Open World!
▶CLANS & GUILDS
- Group up with friends and guildmates, or party up with thousands of other players around the world to take down epic bosses, engage in mass-scale PvP combat, and uncover loot in epic raid dungeons.
▶REAL-TIME COMBATS
- Battle against all who stand in your way! Real-time CO-OP and PVP combat means the action never stops
- Beat them UP! Easy to control, one-tap combo and amazing experience
▶ENDLESS CHARACTER PROGRESSION
- Choose from wide MMORPG range of heroes: Warrior, Archer or Mage
- Uncover powerful ancient relics, upgrade your weapons, unlock new abilities, and customize your gameplay style
- Collect Tome and unleash the wrath of War, combining brutal attacks and supernatural abilities
▶EXTREME ARSENAL & CUSTOMIZATION
- Wield a devastating arsenal of angelic, demonic and Earthly weapons.
- Equip your heroes with unique Mounts, Swords, Gears, Weapons and Furious Wings.
▶VISCERAL GAMEPLAY
- Challenge Multiplayer Dungeon, Boss World, Urgent Wild and more dynamic quests
- Forge powerful alliances to maximize your growth and rally league to defeat rivals
- Various PvP modes in Arena:1v1, 2v2, 3v3, Team battle and Alliance War
▶FANTASY OPEN-WORLD
- Explore a vast, stunning, and lush open-world that allows thousands of players to simultaneously explore, discover, and conquer.
▶OFFLINE AUTO-COMBAT
- Upgrade and kill bosses anytime, anywhere, creating a win-win situation for both work and play

Official Facebook Page
https://www.facebook.com/dark3online/

Official Website
http://dark3.app4gamer.com

comments: Overall, game quality is pretty solid. Few graphic glitches here and there but can be expected. It would be nice to rotate to see a better perspective and easier to hit.   One must improvement needed is that when you play a bot, it's way too noticable. You need to improve the bot intelligence! I understand why bots would be needed time to time.  Coins could be cheaper too.

A great app to download. Great format and graphics. Lots of fun and challenging. Rated everything 5 star other than gameplay. It's good but not great due to the water hazard or out of bounds shots.  Players can hit into the water yet still finish on par. Water hazard should automatically be 2 shots. If this gets changed it would be 5 star no doubt and best golf app.  Single mode would be fantastic to practise

I had to change my rating for this game because I seriously believe it is rigged for me to stop advancing. Everything was great until I made it to pro level and now I'm noticing that whenever I am tied with another player with gems, an extra gem magically appears in the hole making me lose that round. How is it possible that I made it to pro level winning a good percentage of games and now I have played at least 50 rounds on level 3 and can't win a single one?

This game would be awesome if it matched you with people equal to your level but it doesn't. So I spend more time trying to get to the higher levels and not able to upgrade equipment. Of course you could always purchase money but I'm not big on doibg that!

This is overall the best golf game I have come across or any app, in general, relating to sports. My only problem is that sometimes people do not want to, not do not have the ability to create a facebook account. I wish there would be a way to play with your family; without the facebook account users perks.

Main screen isn't immediately obvious what does what. Also a bit annoying that my level changed and I didn't see the wager increased so i was quickly running out of coins until I realised I could step down again. Good game so far though.
description: Join the most exciting multiplayer Golf ever! Challenge players all over the world!Not just golf. This is action-packed Mini Golf with full of adventures and thrills you've never experienced before!Play on gorgeous courses against golfers around the globe in real-time online matches! Win and collect trophies to unlock top stages. Discover and upgrade golf clubs, balls and gloves to customize your gameplay. descriptionHTML:
Join the most exciting multiplayer Golf ever! Challenge players all over the world!
Not just golf. This is action-packed Mini Golf with full of adventures and thrills you've never experienced before!

Play on gorgeous courses against golfers around the globe in real-time online matches! Win and collect trophies to unlock top stages. Discover and upgrade golf clubs, balls and gloves to customize your gameplay. Take on the weekly leaderboard and tournament to win awesome prizes and glory. Do amazing trickshots in Hole in One Challenge. You can also play together with your Facebook friends!

Firing your shot is easier than ever. Just drag and release to hit the ball like playing pool! Aim and shoot carefully to collect the most gems while taking the fastest route to the hole. You can even clash your ball against your rival's to take out their gems! Arcade Mini Golf has never been this quick and fun!

Putt your way through wonders. Golfers' wildest dreams finally come true! Let's ride tube slides, swing on drawbridges, jump over pyramids, explore mazes with bomb traps, and reach farther and fly higher with accelerators and jump pads! Taking advantage of all the tricks while honing your skills is the key to victory!

So if you want to relax with a nice PvP game which is easy to pick up, instantly addicting and hard to master, this will be the best game for you. Start your epic tour in the quest to be the next Mini Golf King!

★★ Download Mini Golf King - Multiplayer Game for free NOW! ★★

KEY FEATURES
- Exciting Mini Golf duel in real-time online multiplayer.

- Unlock chests to discover powerful new golf equipment and upgrade existing ones: drivers, irons, sand wedges, putters, balls and gloves!
- Progress through more advanced stages all the way to the top.

- Conquer three tournament rounds, take mega prizes and be the golf champion!

- Play online matches with your family and friends!

* "Like" Mini Golf King on Facebook for updates and news!
https://www.facebook.com/theMiniGolfKing/

* You need an internet connection to play this game.

- Contacts: Used to verify your Google account in the login process.

- Android OS 6.0 or later: On your device, open the main "Settings" app. Tap "Apps"(or "Application Manager"). Tap "Mini Golf King". Tap "Permissions". Move switches to the right or the left to turn the permissions on or off.

description: Heavy Duty Tractor: Simulator Farm Builder Game 3D is an amazing tractor driving game where user will play the role of village farmer who intends to grow crops on his fields.  Each of the exciting levels will test your driving skills and your ability to handle heavy cargo while driving up hill on hilly road. In the process of growing crops farmer needs a tractor to drive. You need to have really good off road hill climb skills so that the drive is easy. After obtaining crops the next stage is to transport these crops to markets so tractor again will be used for this process. This farming tractor game is hard driving game there is a risk of impossible fall down from steep hills and dangerous mountains. The user first have to perform all the operations that are necessary like Land Preparation where tractor will be used with set of blades. As a best farmer you are a designated driver to transport cargo in the valley of Seattle hills and village farm. The user will plow the fields and later will seed the fields in the main time tractor will be used to spray crops that they never get any insecticides. In this ultimate farming real chained tractor driving cargo diversion you will begin to influence the ground to prepare and with the cultivator you can accomplish this. Once the crops are ready the user will transport these crops to the city markets while drive through bumpy roads and rugged terrains while driving offroad tracks. Fulfill your cargo transportation dreams with the new heavy tractor trolley driving simulator. Dry run your extreme cargo transportation skills The user can apply powerful 4x4 Transmission while going uphill to the mountain tracks that are narrow. The curvy and sharp turns are supposed to be dangerous when user will drive a loaded cargo tractor trolley over it.  The user needs to deliver goods items in this transport simulation as the user will take cargo items and crops to the city while driving on the offroad tracks. The user also take the animals and deliver these animals, take the tractor uphill and drive the tractor on Narrow Roads. Each of the exciting levels will test your driving skills and your ability to handle heavy cargo while driving up hill on hilly road. In the process of growing crops farmer needs a tractor to drive. comments: Hey... I would give this game 5 stars but there is 1 main -VE POINT. FUEL takes TOOOOOOOO LONG TO RECHARGE.  The point of this game is to playyyyyy the game. I don't want to keep waiting. I downloaded your great game TO PLAY it. Please try to solve this issue. I will definitely give you 5 stars if you fix this. Please listen to us and read our comments. Most of us are mentioning this 1 -ve point. Thank you

Great game but seriously?  The feul tho.  It takes 30 minutes to charge and it's only 5 as the limit.  Cmon that's bad!  I love this game and it has great graphics and it's a great time killer but please make the fuel like to 10 or make it 10 minutes to recharge.  If so I'll rate 5 star$

This game deserves to be the best game of the year. Its so simple and yet mesmerizing. It is also very fast so you won't get frustrated and could play this game for hours (or until the fuel runs out :-P). This game is quite exciting and the visuals are also nice. This game deserves more than 5 stars. The music blends in quite well and jobs make it more fun. Their are many sources from which you can get rewards which makes it easy and challenging to play. I love this game. Also you can buy more fuel slots in the shop for 100 diamonds. Its expensive but I don't need it beacuse I have to keep track of the time and only play until the fuel runs out.

THE BEST GAME IN THE APP STORE! The controls couldn't be any simpler, the graphics are sick, the gameplay is exciting, it's challenging but not impossible, it's crazy addictive, the soundtrack is awesome, and you don't have to spend real cash to advance if you don't want to. Even if you do, you can get a lot of different things for under $5! The developers should have statues built of themselves cuz this kick ass game could easily cost $6 or $7. You all did an amazing job and I can't wait to see what else you genius game creators come up with!!! The other Devs should be real nervous, cuz this game destroys all others. Bow down before the awesome glory that is Fastlane!!!

Really good idea let down massively by the developers. Progress is extremely slow due to fuel taking so long to recharge and having to use gems to buy new vehicles. So unless you want to spend all your money on a free game, it doesn't really feel like you're getting anywhere.

Not too bad. I would have like to see the car while playing, and the graphics could be a touch better. I would honestly like an option between dragging your finger and using buttons on either side of the screen. That alone would have given this a 5-star rating from me

description: The Solitaire 5 in 1 offers FIVE of the best Solitaire card games in one app!KLONDIKEKlondike is the most popular card game which can draw 1 or 3 poker card a time. Timeless & Classic Solitaire. Clear all the cards from the table using one or three-card draw. Also try out Traditional or Vegas scoring!SPIDER SOLITAIREThis game has 10 columns and 8 suit of cards(A to King) on the table, you should clear all of them. Play single suit or challenge yourself with four suits!FREECELLThe goal of it is to build up all cards on foundations to 4 left conner pos from Ace to King by following suit. Be strategic and use the four extra cells to move cards around and try to clear all cards from the table. FreeCell rewards players who think several moves ahead.3 PEAKSSelect cards in a sequence, earn combo points, and clear as many boards as you can before you run out of deals! You have to strategically move the cards from each tower to win the game.HILLCombine two cards that add up to 13 to remove them from the board. Challenge yourself to reach the top of the hill and clear as many boards as you can!Game Features:- cooking system- support drag & drop and tap control- animated cards motion- statistics- free hint function- Support phones and tablets- HD images- Support from the small screen all the way up to the large screen tablet.- Sound effect that can be turned on/offTry this Solitaire 5 in 1, you will enjoy it
descriptionHTML:
The Solitaire 5 in 1 offers FIVE of the best Solitaire card games in one app!

KLONDIKE
Klondike is the most popular card game which can draw 1 or 3 poker card a time. Timeless & Classic Solitaire. Clear all the cards from the table using one or three-card draw. Also try out Traditional or Vegas scoring!

SPIDER SOLITAIRE
This game has 10 columns and 8 suit of cards(A to King) on the table, you should clear all of them. Play single suit or challenge yourself with four suits!

FREECELL
The goal of it is to build up all cards on foundations to 4 left conner pos from Ace to King by following suit. Be strategic and use the four extra cells to move cards around and try to clear all cards from the table. FreeCell rewards players who think several moves ahead.

3 PEAKS
Select cards in a sequence, earn combo points, and clear as many boards as you can before you run out of deals! You have to strategically move the cards from each tower to win the game.

HILL
Combine two cards that add up to 13 to remove them from the board. Challenge yourself to reach the top of the hill and clear as many boards as you can!

Game Features:
- cooking system
- support drag & drop and tap control
- animated cards motion
- statistics
- free hint function
- Support phones and tablets
- HD images
- Support from the small screen all the way up to the large screen tablet.
- Sound effect that can be turned on/off

Try this Solitaire 5 in 1, you will enjoy it
developerAddress: 3-205 wen len hua yuan 45 qu baoan shenzhen
summary: Solitaire 5 in 1
title: Solitaire 5 in 1

comments: Great game, anyone knocking it just unable to figure out the puzzle for themselves so they complain. Its no ones fault that youre a dummy but your own. Ads get annoying but take literally 2 seconds to just click back out of them. Wish it was longer but pretty good overall

Clever but also too cryptic at times. Needed the walkthrough a few times.  Was actually a space escape; not sure how different the actual Space Escape game by the same dev will be different.  Ads were so invasive that to complete a puzzle, it required airplane mode so the full puzzle could be viewed, sans ads.

Good but bad Good game sint get me wrong, graphics good but other than that I keep thinking I got a virus on my phone as pop ups randomly pop up on my phone. Also had to do a virus scan on my phone as it kept saying that there was a problem with this app!!

Very short game, approx 20 minutes play time. Graphics are good, but gameplay was spoilt by ads either hiding things or popping up at crucial times. Was enjoying the game until i needed to wear the spacesuit, this put a time limit on how long you could use it due to oxygen level. I don't play and absolutely hate time limits in games. As for selling clues, if you get stuck, watch one of the walkthroughs on YouTube for free.
Game seems good, but... It keeps saying it will give me money to remove adds and unlock all hints, but then tries to charge me when I tap on it.
WORST GAME EVER PLAYED I didn't like it too complicated and I'm pretty sure all the creator wants is money from ads.

description: Introducing to you and your kids our new free development game - "Railway: train for kids." It's not just a game, it's a real railway adventure, consisting of many fascinating mini-games. Games for children have never been so interesting and exciting. All our heroes of the game very much want to get to their homes, and so they hurry to buy a railway ticket at the ticket office of the railway station so that they can take their place in the car before departure. And now, our locomotive with multi-colored cars arrives at the platform, and the cute little animals are hurrying to take their places in the carriages to set out on their way to their home. They sit down by the windows to admire the passing landscapes along the way. But young passengers do not yet know that the children's railway will bring them many surprises and hard trials. To get to the right station, you will have to try very hard and apply a little of your efforts. The trip will be very difficult. On the way our little passengers will have to stop many times to help another train to collect the lost cargo, to show sharpness, to take special tools and to repair broken railway rails, to repair the bridge, destroyed by the terrible earthquake, to get its train out of the tangled underground labyrinth and much more. The last whistle sounded and the merry locomotive set off. Ahead of us waiting for a fun adventure, a very exciting and colorful journey. Games about the train - a real godsend for parents and their kids. These are development games, which represent a whole set of developing elements that are present at every stage of the game. They teach your child color perception in a playful way, teach you to distinguish figures and count, develop visual memory and fine motor skills, attention and logical thinking. And, very importantly, will introduce your baby to the endless variety of the world around him Immerse yourself with your child in a sea of joy and positive emotions, you just need to download our games about locomotives and go on a journey. A good mood awaits you!

descriptionHTML:
Magic Tiles for BTS will challenge your reflexes and reaction time while you play piano covers of your favorite BTS songs!

- Play your favorite BTS songs!
- Challenge your friends and beat their score!
- A must-have app for A.R.M.Y and kpop fans!

HOW TO PLAY
----------------------------------
The game is pretty simple and easy to play:
- tap the black piano tiles and avoid the white tiles to complete the song.
- every time you complete the song, it gets faster!
- the longer you resist, the greater your prizes are!

FEATURES
----------------------------------
- Enhanced gameplay with special tiles such as long notes and bonus blocks.
- 5 different instruments!
- Online leaderboards to compete with other players.
- Lots of daily bonuses.
- Perfect for A.R.M.Y.

DISCLAIMER
----------------------------------
This is an unofficial fan-made application. It is not affiliated with or endorsed by BTS, their management teams, or their record labels.

- Realistic ragdoll physics dismount simulator
- Massive explosions and violent blood, gore, and splatter effects
- Challenging, crazy and brutal action packed missions to complete

Extra reward: get exploding ragdoll dummy and blow up whatever you hit!

Download now for free and rate the game if you liked it!

description: Join the bubble popping task force and shoot and pop balloons in over 1000 challenging levels! There are many fun puzzles and riddles to solve, so you better get going and start this exciting adventure. Sniper Bubbles is the perfect pastime game to play when you want to relax and clear your mind. Warm up your fingers and get ready to show some matching skills, smashing and popping all bubbles. Clear all the bubbles and experience the amazing journey across thousands of handcrafted levels.  How to Play: - Tap on the screen to drag the laser aim and lift it to smash bubbles. - Match at least 3 bubbles of the same color to pop the group and win levels. - Bubble swap is free, all you have to do is tap on the bubble to change the color. - Challenge yourself with thousands of exciting levels!   - Pop 7 bubbles in a row to get a fireball that will burn bubbles on the way.  - Drop 10 bubbles or more to earn a bomb that will burst the surrounding bubbles. - Complete the missions and solve all the different puzzles. You'll absolutely love this fun bubble pop game! Hurry up and download this free addictive bubble shooter game with thousands of challenging levels to satisfy your itch for fun puzzles!

Quickly pass the ball, trickle down the court, and shoot to get in for the slam dunk.

How to Play:
You need to score as many points as possible within the given time. Dunk a ball and score a three-pointer or a jump shot in this basketball game before the time runs out. Block your opponent's basket shot, dunk, and do counter attacks to score and win this awesome 3d basketball game. If you like euro league, premier league, national basketball league then you will enjoy that game.


Fanatical PRO Basketball 2018: World Dunkers Mania Game Features:

• Build and manage your jam team
• Choose your team among top 40+ basketball players
• Improve your players by win matches to earn coins
• Super fun sports basketball simulator game
• World integrated global leader board
• Enjoy different basketball game playing modes

comments: Loved the game for the first few minutes as it is very simple and interesting. BUT may photos temperature started to climb and quickly shot through the roof to a point where it literally burns you! And it kills your battery! For a simple game like this these facts fore me to give only one star. Fix the code and improve the graphics and it can easily get a 4 to 5 star rating.

Great time waster, I've been checking in on it every day for about a month. My biggest problem with the game is that there aren't enough prestige balls, once you get thunder there is almost no incentive to keep playing. I hope that more prestige balls are added in some future update. Otherwise, this is a flawless mobile game. There aren't too many ads, the graphical design is very simple yet effective, and the draw to keep coming back lasts for a long time. It takes a WHILE to get all 5 prestige balls.

Silly pointless battery killing little game, I loved it! The game kinda runs out of puff after level 150 though, as there is nothing else to achieve. I've got all the prestige balls, all the regular balls, all above level 150. Can we have some higher order balls above Thunder please?

This is a cute little fun game but it keeps crashing I can't even open it so therefore that's why you got such low reviews. I was having a lot of fun with it until it started crashing. Even uninstalling and reinstalling did not fix the problem. I hope you eventually get it fixed it would be worth downloading again.

Game play is alright but the adverts are annoying! Especially ones where come back on the game to get points: you can watch video for x2 the amount or just collect... Even the just collect end up watching a video! So might as well just have as x2

Looks BORING at first. But I can't put it down now. And to those complaining about the adds, spam the back button after they start. The only adds this doesn't work for are the ones with the fast forward button in the top left

comments: Its a fun easy way to pass time. Its a boxing game so you cant really exspect there to be alot to do. It would be nice to be able to train your character and make him stronger and faster. It would also be nice to be able to customize your character from scratch id make my character look like myself. There are so many other boxing apps out there you cant say this is the best but it kills time. I think this game would do much better as a kickboxing/martials beat em up. Maybe throw a little steets of rage arcade gameplay in there. This is a good game that will get old real fast.

Great fun game with potential - needs a bit more upgrading features - like costume or skins of " historical boxers etc. Upgrades are limited to lvl so huge gap between character enhancements make it feel a bit unprogressive at times - definitely deserve a try and will love

Obvious cash grab like 99% of the play store these days. There is a definitive and game ending lag to this game which is hard to overcome, it needs fixing. And 500,000+ coins for a pair of shorts? Like I said, cash grab.

I really enjoy the game so far but I have a few suggestions to help.  1.  Fix how we level up player skills.  Stopping the bar in the right place is annoying to do.  2.  Add more attacks like...a double back dash attack for your regular and power punch, a forward dash for the power punch and for the special skill when you get it, more combo button presses like light punch power punch light punch power punch etc.  3.  More characters.  I love the bone breaks it was a great touch.  I hope you keep updating this regularly EDIT:  Another thing that should be looked at in my opinion is the taunt right when the match starts in the 1st Rd before u fight right after the bell rings.  Remove it.  Make them each do it before the Rd starts.  It's very annoying to start like that

More attacks, combo attacks, real damage if the arm is broken it should go limp and not work that would be cool,and can you please let people constantly and continue to hit the downed opponent after they already lost, you know extra cheap shots, more brutal honesty keep going I love it.
Need to find tune with up grading your characters. It's difficult to the amount of currency you have. Other than that it is a fun game. Recommend if your bored.
