description: Are you crazy fans of fire and water or fire and ice (teamwork game) ?Fall in love adventure maze game and remember it from childhood ?Fire Red boy and his lover (ice girl - Water girl) who go with him is a puzzle adventure game for two players. It's an very addicting game to play with your kids, your lover and your friend.You've got two characters to control in this exciting puzzle game. Lead Red boy and Water girl to their doors in each level of the Crystal Temp Maze, collecting fire diamonds and ice diamonds along the way. Red boy must avoid the water and Ice girl must avoid the fire, and be careful, the black water kills them both. Using your brain to control objects in game such as lever, pusher, mirror, black ball, light beam, elevator, wind machine, pulley systemin order to open path that leads to the doors.GREAT GAME FEATURES:- 30 Maps and continue update - Nice character fire boy is red boy- Nice character blue girl is water girl- Always support .All levels are updating frequently- Nice Soundtrack- Classic gameplay from web- Back to childhood

descriptionHTML:
Driving forestry machines is fun! Use harvester, logging truck and other machines, supply sawmill with timber. Try driving logging truck and Timber Harvester Simulator for a sawmill in our forestry machines simulator - it’s better than cutting real trees!

Features of Timber Harvester Simulator:
- Big forest full of timber
- Variety of forestry machines
- Forest logging missions
- Realistic machines control and physics
- Open world driving

Realistic machines!
You have three types of forestry machines in the simulator - harvester, tow truck and logging truck. All machines have unique roles in forestry. Learn functions and ways of driving main forestry machines in our simulator - harvester, timber truck or tow truck are yours to play with. Every forestry truck type also has driving missions in the Timber Harvester Simulator - cut timber with harvester, deliver it with logging truck and complete other tasks.

Forestry job!
Driving big forestry machines like Timber Harvester Simulator and logging truck in our simulator is a man’s job! Get your truck and learn forestry machines driving tutorial in the simulator. Once you learn driving harvester, logging truck and other machines, do timber logging missions. The forest is full of job and timber, get to it!

Big forest!
Driving forestry machines, like logging truck or harvester will take to different locations for timber. Pass offroad locations on your truck to deliver and cut the timber. Don’t get lost while driving between sawmill and harvester sites. Explore different forestry locations in our simulator and do offroad truck delivery!

Harvest all timber in the simulator of Timber Harvester Simulator - a simulator of forestry machines like harvester or timber truck!

description: Meet the continuation of the game series Survival in the Ocean!You are person who survived after airplane crash in deep ocean. No one around could help you. On the horizon is not visible land. Around only the ocean and hungry sharks.But fortunately, the boxes that were left behind after the plane crash are passing by! You have a hook with you! You can collect these boxes - they can have many useful resources and items. You should watch over your health and at the time of eating. At the top of the screen are indicators of health, satiety and oxygen levels. Take food to replenish your health. You can go fishing and then cook your food at the stake. So you can live longer.Dive into the water - there are many interesting things! Beware of dangerous hungry sharks. Craft a powerful tool in the workbench to protect yourself from sharks. Collect seaweed on the ocean floor, look for hiding places. From algae you can make a very nutritious soup!Make your raft as big as you can! Collect different resources. Use them to craft new items. Use the workbench and oven to open new recipes for craft.Ocean Survival 3D - 2 features:- Ultimate ocean survival simulator- Life on raft- Dangerous underwater world- Easy learning craft system- Optimized graphics- Realistic visual effectsDive into deep ocean, explore underwater world! It's time to survive with Ocean Survival 3D - 2!
descriptionHTML:
Meet the continuation of the game series Survival in the Ocean!
You are person who survived after airplane crash in deep ocean. No one around could help you. On the horizon is not visible land. Around only the ocean and hungry sharks.

But fortunately, the boxes that were left behind after the plane crash are passing by! You have a hook with you! You can collect these boxes - they can have many useful resources and items.

You should watch over your health and at the time of eating. At the top of the screen are indicators of health, satiety and oxygen levels. Take food to replenish your health. You can go fishing and then cook your food at the stake. So you can live longer.

Dive into the water - there are many interesting things! Beware of dangerous hungry sharks. Craft a powerful tool in the workbench to protect yourself from sharks. Collect seaweed on the ocean floor, look for hiding places. From algae you can make a very nutritious soup!

Make your raft as big as you can! Collect different resources. Use them to craft new items. Use the workbench and oven to open new recipes for craft.

Ocean Survival 3D - 2 features:
- Ultimate ocean survival simulator
- Life on raft
- Dangerous underwater world
- Easy learning craft system
- Optimized graphics
- Realistic visual effects

Dive into deep ocean, explore underwater world! It's time to survive with Ocean Survival 3D - 2!
recentChanges: - fixed climb on raft from water
- improved graphics - choose Graphics Quality in the Settings
- new visual effects - realistic water and weather
- you can escape - try to find a way out

comments: Has a lot of potential. The game itself at this point isn't that good, at least for me, because I want it to be like.. sims. The characters need a bit of free will, what I mean is I can control the main character freely, and talk to the children and not being like a mannequin. The control for the camera is a bit weird. Overall... hmm... I don't like it.. because it looks like a kids game.

I don't think levels are nessecary. Basically, they don't exactly apply to anything so put them in 'task list' based on days you need to do. Also,controls and graphics are pretty good but try to polish them a bit. It needs some work. Please make this more interesting.

It's an okay game. I beat it all the way to level 18 and there wasn't anymore levels. Needs more independence upon what mom does. Also kind of childish to keep having the navigating hand. The graphics could be better as well. But good concept. Once more is added I'll  reinstall it and rate it over. Thanks

Bad controls make it very frustrating. There's just not much going on but walking around with extreme difficulty due to controls. Also the neighbors houses are tiny if you walk up to one the front door only goes to your waist.
Why does mom have to do tasks like find husband's socks while he stands still=annoying. ALSO THE CAMERA BLOCKS THE PLAYER'S VIEW =even more annoying. But good job on the graphics
Too many ads! Every time I go to the next level I have to wait for ages and by the time its loaded I am bored! Maybe make the levels last longer? Other than that its OK!

description: Today we decide to bring you another kind of princess makeup games, much better than our older makeup salon games and the first one is called Princess Makeup and Nail Salon, where all girls which like fashion and nail games can change a cute doll in a real princess, using tons of cosmetics, colors and clothes.Now your dreams came true and you have a big and complete beauty makeup salon and there you can prove your makeup artist skills and transform your favorite doll in a gorgeous princess. In the beginning she needs a beauty treatment of her skin, a stunning makeup with beautiful colors, some pretty blouses and necklaces and at the end a pretty manicure with gorgeous patterns for her nails.First step in all our princess makeup games is to use our special creams for a beauty skin treatment. Apply a facial mask, use the shower and do not forget to use also the eye mask. At the end of this level of our makeup salon games tour doll is ready for the next step.The second level will bring you in a world of colors. Tons of colors for lipstick and eyeshadows are available for you and you must pick what you like most. Use red or yellow, blue or green, combine them and make a real rainbow if you want. Try all you believe that will be nice for the pretty doll. The lipstick will complete this nice makeup and be sure that the color of lips will match with the color of makeup. To complete this fabulous look, choose elegant dresses and beautiful jewerly.After this princess makeup games part, we invite you in a virtual nail salon for one of the most fancy manicure that you can try for your princess. There are a lot of nail polish and you may choose the one you want or even combine the colors for each nail. Will be awesome, for sure ! The gorgeous patterns will complete your work in the nail salon games and your client will be very happy.Princess Makeup and Nail Salon Games features :- a big beauty makeup salon with a lot of creams and cosmetics treatments- a complete makeup box for princess makeup games- a virtual nail salon with all you want for a perfect manicure- a lot of colors for nail polish like in all our nail games- elegant dresses and accessories- easy to play, like all our makeup gamesWe hope that our nail salon games are what you want and you will write in your comments your opinion about how  we can make them as you like. Enjoy playing !
descriptionHTML:
Today we decide to bring you another kind of princess makeup games, much better than our older makeup salon games and the first one is called Princess Makeup and Nail Salon, where all girls which like fashion and nail games can change a cute doll in a real princess, using tons of cosmetics, colors and clothes.

Now your dreams came true and you have a big and complete beauty makeup salon and there you can prove your makeup artist skills and transform your favorite doll in a gorgeous princess. In the beginning she needs a beauty treatment of her skin, a stunning makeup with beautiful colors, some pretty blouses and necklaces and at the end a pretty manicure with gorgeous patterns for her nails.

First step in all our princess makeup games is to use our special creams for a beauty skin treatment. Apply a facial mask, use the shower and do not forget to use also the eye mask. At the end of this level of our makeup salon games tour doll is ready for the next step.

The second level will bring you in a world of colors. Tons of colors for lipstick and eyeshadows are available for you and you must pick what you like most. Use red or yellow, blue or green, combine them and make a real rainbow if you want. Try all you believe that will be nice for the pretty doll. The lipstick will complete this nice makeup and be sure that the color of lips will match with the color of makeup. To complete this fabulous look, choose elegant dresses and beautiful jewerly.

After this princess makeup games part, we invite you in a virtual nail salon for one of the most fancy manicure that you can try for your princess. There are a lot of nail polish and you may choose the one you want or even combine the colors for each nail. Will be awesome, for sure ! The gorgeous patterns will complete your work in the nail salon games and your client will be very happy.

Princess Makeup and Nail Salon Games features :

- a big beauty makeup salon with a lot of creams and cosmetics treatments
- a complete makeup box for princess makeup games
- a virtual nail salon with all you want for a perfect manicure
- a lot of colors for nail polish like in all our nail games

We hope that our nail salon games are what you want and you will write in your comments your opinion about how we can make them as you like. Enjoy playing !

I reckon I could make an app with better quality than this (no offence!) At the end, it literally says 'The End' I have to admit, it would be nice for it to say 'Well done! Thank you for playing! Find The Cat 2 is now available in the app store!' Just to show that is playing this game is appreciated. Overall, okay app, just a few things to make it a bit better.  Btw, the cats are so cute!! (When you can find them!)  Hints: 244 is in the black grid of the red car, to the right. 247 the cat is one of the logs in the house.

244 is really hard but it's a great time killer! But I do think that there should be a hint button and if there is one I missed it. It can be hard with some photos but most of them are really easy! So I think you should definitely get this app! Hope I helped!

comments: This game is by far one of the BEST games I've ever downloaded. There are so many different games within and the story line so far is awesome. I love how interactive it is and the fact that you have so much to work up towards! Yes the ads may suck but it's free so I can't complain. Absolute A+ for whomever created this, highly recommend and I hope there will be more games like this!

Nice looking game, from what I can tell after 3 levels. Do I want to pay $15 to play more? I dont think it is that good. I do like the interactive intro/start up, and the game runs smooth. Graphics look nice. But still is it worth $15?  Dont think so, sorry guys. But I am sure other people might get enjoyment from this game so much they will pay to play. Good luck with it guys.

1st of all, thank you for making it possible to play for free with ads!(I don't mind them in exchange for free game üòÅ) And I love this game even more than the 1st one! Especially since the challenge games now rewards 3 diamonds instead of 1 so that it's quicker to buy items for Allison's room~ Looking forward to more games from this series üòò

Its a game that you never expect to see and play! When I first download the game, I thought this is like any other games where you normally interact with but when I open the game, it's started like a mini movie scene followed by lots of drama (a good one). I played non stop. I love this game so much. Too bad there's so many ads each time you press play on every level. The game would be so nice if there's no ads at all.

This is one of the BEST time management games I've ever played; I've never come across a time management game with such a beautiful story line. You will not regret playing this. Plus, this game doesn't force you to buy it; just sit through some ads. It's completely worth it. I can't stop raving about this game to my friends. Had me in tears a few levels into the story.

This game is awful. The first thing that one sees any game is the cover photo of the game and the cover photo with Allison's face is beautifully drawn. The combination of time management with a captivating storyline of love and drama is deadly,  and with the fact that it's totally free with some ads, makes the perfect game that one can immerse himself in. The character drawings and animations were also beautiful. Was sad when the game finally ended. Really looking forward towards the next game of the series.

descriptionHTML:
Your favorite doctor Allison is back in a gripping hospital time management game that you'll never forget! And neither will she... 🏥 🚑 🔥

❤️ PLAY THE EAGERLY AWAITED SEQUEL to Heart's Medicine - Time to Heal and join your favorite doctor on a breathtaking new adventure
❤️ BECOME A DOCTOR in 60 captivating time management levels and 30 extra challenge stages
❤️ DISCOVER 23 MINI-GAMES and perform special treatments, like filling lungs with oxygen, focusing readouts and removing negative emotions
❤️ WITNESS A MEDICAL DRAMA filled with romance, friendship, drama, and life-changing decisions
❤️ UPGRADE THE HOSPITAL by completing levels and earning new equipment across 6 heated chapters
❤️ CATCH UP WITH THE CAST and find out what's been going down with all your favorite characters from Little Creek Hospital
❤️ COMPLETE SPECIAL CHALLENGES and collect diamonds to decorate Allison's apartment
❤️ ENJOY MANY EXTRAS like competing against your friends in an endless level

Ready to find out what drama Heart's Medicine - Hospital Heat will bring our beloved doctor? 👩‍⚕️

This season picks up right after the previous compelling adventure. Things finally seem to have calmed down at Little Creek Hospital... 🏥

But not for long! When Allison receives a phone call from her mother, she doesn't know what to think. She hasn't seen her mom in over 20 years! Why would she contact Allison after all this time? And what could she want? Allison is left with no choice other than to face her past, in order to discover her future...
Will she have the strength to cope with everything that has happened and all that is yet to come? There's only one way to find out...

Help Allison face her tragic past in this fiery hospital time management game! 💉 🚑 🔥

Try the first few levels for free! The full complement of levels can be unlocked with an in-app purchase.

Follow Allison on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/heartsmedicinegame/

comments: I really like the game...I love all of your games, but I'm a little disappointed with this one. How can you not have any white veils or shoes in a wedding game? Why no black shoes for the groom? And the flower girl looks like a cartoon! You guys need to make some changes but overall I love this game...‚ù§

Made the mistake of buying this. There are no white veils, which is ridiculous. No black or brown hair. No different skintones.  Hairdos are very limited. The flower girl looks weird. And the gameplay itself is frustrating. When you hit the checkmark in a location it just randomly takes you to another area. And if you've already been there you have to do it over again or the game will just assign random stuff. When you hit the checkmark it should just take you back to the map. The setup now is just dumb. Save your money. Wish I could get mine back.

It's ok The first games gave you the option of what color you wanted the girl's skin to be. Not saying this game is racist or anything. It's just when I play a dress up games I usually have her look like me, and I'm sure there are little girls out there that would want this too. I'm not sure if I missed that feature or not but so far I haven't seen it yet. Sorry to say this but if you did have that option. ...I still would of rated two stars anyway but that's probably because I'm in my late teens.

descriptionHTML:
Become the best Wedding Planner around, and plan dream weddings! From designing beautiful gowns to designing the yummiest cakes, you’ve got a lot to do! With your expert planning, even the most demanding bridezillas and difficult grooms will be happy!

Many happy couples are newly engaged - now it’s time to prepare for their wedding day! Design wedding dresses and choose everything from flowers to delicious cakes - make it the wedding they’ve always dreamed of! With your help, they can even be featured on a magazine cover!

Features:
> Design glamorous wedding dresses! Create the perfect dress for each customer!
> Help the handsome grooms choose a killer tux! Don’t forget the bowtie!
> Make delicious cakes decorated with frosting flowers and a romantic bride & groom topper!
> Plan a luxurious day at the spa for the brides so she they can relax before their weddings!
> Enhance your customers’ bridal beauty with stunning makeovers!
> Style their hair in fabulous up-dos or leave it down with luscious curls!
> What do you want the wedding hall to look like? The choice is up to you - YOU’RE the planner!
> Choose the most adorable flower girls and give them the cutest dresses!
> Choose stunning wedding bands for the bride and groom!

description: Have you ever wanted to own and look after your own horse? Well now you can with the horse grooming salon game! Here you will be able to easily choose your own horse and do all the things that need to be done when owning and looking after your horse. Here you can clean out her stall, swat all the annoying flies, as well as wash, dry and brush her to make her look pretty. You can also change her horse shoes and remove any dirt, while also feeding her, watering her, rubbing her down and giving her vaccinations. Once done you can easily accessorize by using a bridle, saddle, and headpiece to prepare her for her day out riding with this fun horse grooming game. Game Features: - CHOOSE your very own horse to look after- CLEAN up all the poo with the broom- SWAT all the flies before they bite your horse and cause sores- WASH, rinse, dry and brush your horse ready for her grooming session- CLEAN her teeth to give her a beautiful smile. - CHANGE her horse shoes so she can ride without pain or discomfort- CLIP her hair to make it look nice and straight for her big debut- VACCINATE your horse so she can be around other horses- FEED and water your horse so she is ready for riding- RUB all her good spots to show her you love her- ACCESSORIZE with a saddle, head piece and bridle** version 3.0.0 LATEST UPDATE- play levels you want with our contextual level menu, button is located on the top right corner- earn coins to unlock new horses- added new horses- faster game play
descriptionHTML:
Have you ever wanted to own and look after your own horse? Well now you can with the horse grooming salon game! Here you will be able to easily choose your own horse and do all the things that need to be done when owning and looking after your horse. Here you can clean out her stall, swat all the annoying flies, as well as wash, dry and brush her to make her look pretty. You can also change her horse shoes and remove any dirt, while also feeding her, watering her, rubbing her down and giving her vaccinations. Once done you can easily accessorize by using a bridle, saddle, and headpiece to prepare her for her day out riding with this fun horse grooming game.

Game Features:

- CHOOSE your very own horse to look after

- CLEAN up all the poo with the broom

- SWAT all the flies before they bite your horse and cause sores

- WASH, rinse, dry and brush your horse ready for her grooming session

- CLEAN her teeth to give her a beautiful smile.

- CHANGE her horse shoes so she can ride without pain or discomfort

- CLIP her hair to make it look nice and straight for her big debut

- VACCINATE your horse so she can be around other horses

- FEED and water your horse so she is ready for riding

- RUB all her good spots to show her you love her

- ACCESSORIZE with a saddle, head piece and bridle

** version 3.0.0 LATEST UPDATE

- play levels you want with our contextual level menu, button is located on the top right corner

- earn coins to unlock new horses

- added new horses

- faster game play
summary: Owning your own horse doesn't have to be a dream, choose yours today.
title: Horse Grooming Salon

description: Welcome to Farm Tractor Trolley Cargo Simulator 2018!You have obviously driven four gear cars and trucks on mixed tracks, but this is the time you should try stunning four gear drive on a Farm Tractor with dissimilar wheel size. You should try driving an auto mobile whose wheel size is not same, believe me its significantly difficult. Eight cylinder large beam engine make it even difficult to practice conventional driving skills on a Heavy Tractor. Live the life of village farmer & transport your life's earning to the city market.Fulfill your cargo transportation dreams with the new heavy tractor trolley driving simulator. Dry run your extreme cargo transportation skills on this new modified version of cargo transport simulator to check your heavy duty transporter handling skills on mountainous tracks and elevated roadsides. Transporting loaded trolleys with the help of a heavy tractor is not as easy as it looks like. This Heavy tractor cargo transport sim composed of very difficult yet exciting game play options which challenge your cargo transportation skills on various deadly tracks. Transport farming products like wheat, forage grass, pumpkins and other crops.Majority of young generation is not aware of what a tractor is, but it is the foremost component of farming even in this modern era. Farming is incomplete without cargo tractors which help transport farming goods from one place to other. This brand new 3D cargo transporter game will give you the real life experience of driving heavy duty cargo tractors and natural atmosphere which you have never experienced. Transportation of goods from city market to farm cites is not possible without real tractor cargo transport. This needs pro cargo driving skills due to long and bouncy tracks. Challenge your heavy duty tractor driving skills in Tractor Cargo Simulator, grow your farm and become the all time best cargo transport driver of the city.Cultivated crops when harvested are loaded from various farming fields and action villages on Heavy Tractor Trolleys. Forage plough farming also need Heavy Tractor to move to nearby markets after being loaded by the help of little cranes. This latest Tractor trolley Simulator is equipped with charming 3D graphics and a variety of locations and dangerous tracks to drive on while challenging your tractor trolley driving skills. You can enjoy variety of farming modes such as transportation of farming animals from different locations, transporting fertilizers and pesticides to protect your farm from insects attack, or delivering ready feed-stock to the nearby market to earn money. You can also transport wood logs from jungle sites to furniture markets to earn lot of money. Heavy Tractor Trolley Cargo:Rural Farmer Simulator Features:- Realistic cultivated lush green farms ready to be harvested- Go out in the field and load your tractor trolley with wood logs- Drive carefully to deliver farming goods to nearby city market- Manage everything on the ranch- Drive Over the Mountains and steep deadly tracks- Advanced engine physics and easy controls- Transport animals like sheep, goat & cows via truck driving- Loaded Tractor Trolley drive on Risky 3D tracks

description: How exciting! Kiki is going shopping with Mama Panda! It means the freedom to explore, only if he can stay out of trouble! See the problems he will run into! Perhaps, you can give him a big hand!Fun features:- Easy concepts with child-friendly gameplay- 4 independent scenes with fun interactions- Silly and entertaining animations!With freedom comes responsibility. Our goal is to bring safety awarenesses to children. They will relate safety tips to the situations they see and catch all the poor behaviors acted out by our silly panda Kiki. Maybe they will pay more attention to safety the next time they go out, too!  -- -- --  Design concepts:We focus on inspirational learningWe focus on skill-buildingWe focus on bringing fun contents to our young audienceTake the baby bus for an unique learning experience!The series introduction:BabyBus is the first trusted brand in early childhood educational software. The mobile applications are designed and developed specifically for preschoolers, and they are divided into two groups by age, the Starter Group for toddlers between the ages of 1 and 3 and the Prodigy Group for children between the ages of 3 and 6. The educational series in the Prodigy Group combines the main concepts of early childhood education to meet the needs of mastering different learning categories. The applications are aimed at the comprehensive and the analytic development in preschoolers.Tips: In the search bar, enter "BabyBus" to find all of our products.Feel free to tell us your thoughts on our games and services using the contact methods listed below: Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BabyBusENGLISHE-mail: en@babybus.comWebsite: http://www.babybus.com

How exciting! Kiki is going shopping with Mama Panda! It means the freedom to explore, only if he can stay out of trouble! See the problems he will run into! Perhaps, you can give him a big hand!

With freedom comes responsibility. Our goal is to bring safety awarenesses to children. They will relate safety tips to the situations they see and catch all the poor behaviors acted out by our silly panda Kiki. Maybe they will pay more attention to safety the next time they go out, too!

BabyBus is the first trusted brand in early childhood educational software. The educational series in the Prodigy Group combines the main concepts of early childhood education to meet the needs of mastering different learning categories. The applications are aimed at the comprehensive and the analytic development in preschoolers.

descriptionHTML:
Time for you and your friends to become the best little chefs around! No adults are around and you kids are hungry – you better prepare food, and fast! You guys are in charge – cook and bake whatever yummy food you want, and have a food fight!

Uh-oh – You’re starving, and no parents are home to feed you! It’s up to you and your friends to turn into gourmet chefs and make a delicious meal! Who said dinner before dessert?! You’re in charge now! Get creative in the kitchen and eat all the mouthwatering food you want!

Features:
> Is that your stomach growling? No one’s home to give you dinner, so you better get to the kitchen and start cooking!
> Turn into little kitchen wizards with your friends and prepare your favorite meals!
> Go to the supermarket with your friends and fill your carts to your heart’s desire!
> Choose yummy recipes to make, from 4 amazing cookbooks!
> Dress up as mini chefs, and clean up the messy kitchen! Don’t forget your chef’s hat!
> Use professional chef tools to make homemade pasta and pizza from scratch!
> FOOD FIGHT! Get messy in the kitchen.
> Bake cupcakes and make your own ice cream!
> You guys worked so hard making all that food – now it’s time to enjoy it in the dining room!
> Oh no! The oven exploded and one of your friends got hurt. Treat him with professional doctor tools so he can bake those treats!
> Have bake contests and vote for your favorite food. Who will win 1st prize?

Ally with players from all over the world, compete for the title of City landlord. Lead all players toresist the invasion, bring peace to your City, protect the planet‚Äôs civilization.In the world of Art of War: Last Day, you have to fight for your survival at every moment.Features:Train 8 Units of 4 types and forge powerful arms and equipment to protect yourself;Recruit strong Heroes, match the Heroes‚Äô Skills cleverly to form the most powerful Army;Upgrade your Commander, use the features of their Talents to Build the most powerful Base;Research Technology in every field in the Tech Center to increase your power;Join other players‚Äô Alliances or create your ow Alliance to face the challenge from players all over the world;When Resources are scarce, whether you should scheme carefully and wait patiently, or launch combat to plunder other players, you should always be determined to make decisions during the development process.The combat has already begun! descriptionHTML:
Art of War: Last Day is a mobile strategy game with a future theme. Build a Base, Arm your Troops, Plunder Resources, Defeat Zombies. All for your survival.

When humans fought fiercely in Doomsday war with the self-aware AI System, ADAMS, its evil plan was being carried on quietly. Discovering humanity’s real fear: their dead relatives and friends due to the war between human and AIs have come back in an unexpected way…Having experienced a certain kind of unknown cruel tests, humans have realized those cold-blooded AIs have disappeared and been replaced with those without a single thought, who only know attacking…the Zombies! The civilization on this planet is at risk!

In this epic strategy game, use your forces and strategy to defeat Zombies and out of control AI Robots.

Build your Base, defeat the out of control AI Robots and mutated Zombies. Ally with players from all over the world, compete for the title of City landlord. Lead all players toresist the invasion, bring peace to your City, protect the planet’s civilization.

In the world of Art of War: Last Day, you have to fight for your survival at every moment.

Features:

Train 8 Units of 4 types and forge powerful arms and equipment to protect yourself;
Recruit strong Heroes, match the Heroes’ Skills cleverly to form the most powerful Army;
Upgrade your Commander, use the features of their Talents to Build the most powerful Base;
Research Technology in every field in the Tech Center to increase your power;
Join other players’ Alliances or create your ow Alliance to face the challenge from players all over the world;

When Resources are scarce, whether you should scheme carefully and wait patiently, or launch combat to plunder other players, you should always be determined to make decisions during the development process.

The combat has already begun! Join Now! Defeat enemies and restore our beautiful home!

Please pay attention! Art of War: AI Uprising is a free-to-download game, with some in-app payment options. If you do not want to use this function, please disable the in-app purchase in the settings of your device.

Are you having problems? Send an email to aowhelp@betterfun.net to contact us, or contact the support staff by tapping on the Customer Service building inside of your base.

Superhero you and your craft - survival. This amazing world is full of dangers, you will have very little time to make decisions, you need a lot of ingenuity and good reaction to achieve at least some results.
Jump, dodge, fly around obstacles in its path, if you bump into an obstacle, the story is over.


The game offers 5 modes :
Flight - fly around the poles. Caution! Some columns can move.
Running - live in the rhythm of parkour, run, jumping over barriers. You can do a double jump.
Jumping - you need to get as high as possible, you will have to pursue the monster, which will annihilate the floor beneath you. If you are not fast enough, it will fall.

comments: I've tried about most of the bowling games on line and none compare with this one.  I almost had a perfect 300 game but for 1 spare frame.  You can back off the foul line and really speed the ball for a perfect strike.  None of the others can do that!  Love it.  One change please, put the high score function back into play. Finally got my 1st perfect 300 game and no one witnessed it!  ü§óüò†üëç

Used to be better It nags you to death about installing Google Games, as if it won't run right without it (runs fine). Then if you install it it nags you to login. All this so that you can do stuff I have no interest in, like posting your scores online.  Allow us to turn off the nagging, please. This is the best bowling app I've seen, which is a sad statement about the quality of bowling apps. Unrealistic physics for the pin action that make it impossible to ever do a split. No way to impart a spin on the ball.

This is a nice bowling game that works beautifully on my 10" tablet.  The ball can be rolled slow or very fast.  The pins act as if they're very light weight.  This is a good game for beginners or anyone who just wants to bowl a quick, satisfying game. Aiming the ball is easy. I like the fact that this game connects to Google Play Games.  The ball can appear a darker color if pulled back toward you too far. Check out the ball with the hand imprint or the one with the spider.  If I could recommend one update, it would be to update the year (2014 bugs me) and prevent the ball from being snagged up by the thin black line.  Also, please relay my score rather than telling me to wait until a friend plays for comparison.

REAL BOWLING!!!!! Wow finally found a good no frills bowling game! The ball movement is wonderful! You can get it to do all kinds of things. I can launch it like a missile or granny roll and even throw yes throw!!!! IT HAVE FUN if I could give it ten stars I would.
Best bowling game on the app store There are so many games with all this unneeded nonsense, you have no idea how hard it is to find a bowling game where you just roll a ball at pins.

I've been playing this game for 2 years now and I love it. The screen doesn't bounce around and jerk like some of the other games, or flash brite colors at you. Just line your ball up with your arrows just like real bowling. I got 7 strikes in a row one time.üê∂üê∂üê∂

Lovely little game. Starts out easy showing you the controls/events, but quickly ramps up the puzzle. Speech bubbles get in the way of putting lines down and cause you to lose because you only had 30s to complete the level. Adding an option for a topdown view would solve this because then you could actually see all the directions instead of only 2-3 at a time. Oh and the ads suck. Can we buy a version without them?

What the game is this....everything in the game matters...the no of poles which decides the resistance...the current flow in it indicating potential difference...3 lines conduct more than 2 and single lines...the hurricanes and disconnections indicate open circuit.... I'm an electrical student...finally finished the game...this game is fantastic...just need one more such game from STATNETT...thank you for this game....the other app ohm is also good...plzz develop one more such game!!!!!!!! THE FUTURE IS DEFINITELY ELECTRIC!!!

Creating lines maneuvering needs improvement. It's hard, I have to zoom in just to get it right. But over all, it's a nice game. Now, I get to understand the complexity. Often times, we in our area simply complain about brownouts without knowing the critical planning and action being done in the background. Kudos!
Opened to just a black screen that played music. Absolutely no indication that anything was happening. My screen might as well have been locked, except I could still swipe in the notification bar
description: Without electricity there is chaos. Balance is a free puzzle game about electricity and power grids. Your goal is to make sure there are no blackouts, that the power grids are functional, and that you always produce the right amount of power.The game offers many challenges you probably never thought about: - Did you know that the amount of power produced is changed all day and night to match the amount we use? - Did you know that there is a limit on how much power you can transmit through a single power line without it getting overloaded? - Did you know that an well-built power grid could have any one line disconnected without causing blackouts?You do not need any knowledge about electricity or power grids in order to enjoy this game. Balance is developed by Statnett, the system operator in the Norwegian energy system, and is based on real challenges they work with every day.
descriptionHTML:
Without electricity there is chaos. Balance is a free puzzle game about electricity and power grids. Your goal is to make sure there are no blackouts, that the power grids are functional, and that you always produce the right amount of power.

The game offers many challenges you probably never thought about:
- Did you know that the amount of power produced is changed all day and night to match the amount we use?
- Did you know that there is a limit on how much power you can transmit through a single power line without it getting overloaded?
- Did you know that an well-built power grid could have any one line disconnected without causing blackouts?
You do not need any knowledge about electricity or power grids in order to enjoy this game.

Balance is developed by Statnett, the system operator in the Norwegian energy system, and is based on real challenges they work with every day.
recentChanges: Fixed a few bugs and breaking issues with some of the levels.
summary: Balance is a puzzle game where you build and maintain the power grid.
title: Balance

description: Lift Safety For Kids is a good game to teach your little ones about lifts. In this safety game, you can learn how to use the lift properly will ensure fun for everyone. Here we can add tons safety levels for you, In the first level, you can learn If the elevator is full Be patient and wait for the next ride, Wait till everyone gets off the elevator. At the next level, you can learn about lift buttons and many more learning tips. Next level kids will learn what to do when the lift is stuck and also learn how to exit from the elevator. After that, you can learn what to do in case of fire in the elevator. So visit each and every level in this kids learning game and learn tons safety tips in a fun way. Play and enjoy this Kids Safety game and don't forget to share it with your friends and all the family members.List of safety tips:- Unshoulder your bag before entering into the elevator- Stand straight facing the elevator's door- Press the button of the desired level- Keep the elevator neat and clean- Stand peacefully and wait till your desired level- Stand still till the door is completely open- Prefer stairs in case of fireLift Safety For Kids is pre toddler and early age educational game. descriptionHTML:
Lift Safety For Kids is a good game to teach your little ones about lifts. In this safety game, you can learn how to use the lift properly will ensure fun for everyone. Here we can add tons safety levels for you, In the first level, you can learn If the elevator is full Be patient and wait for the next ride, Wait till everyone gets off the elevator. At the next level, you can learn about lift buttons and many more learning tips. Next level kids will learn what to do when the lift is stuck and also learn how to exit from the elevator. After that, you can learn what to do in case of fire in the elevator. So visit each and every level in this kids learning game and learn tons safety tips in a fun way. Play and enjoy this Kids Safety game and don't forget to share it with your friends and all the family members.

List of safety tips:

- Unshoulder your bag before entering into the elevator
- Stand straight facing the elevator's door
- Press the button of the desired level
- Keep the elevator neat and clean
- Stand peacefully and wait till your desired level
- Stand still till the door is completely open
- Prefer stairs in case of fire

descriptionHTML:
This is fully physics based 3D funny boxing game. All you have to is click one button and try to punch your opponent's head!

You can punch your opponents with your strong arms at the same time, you need stay on ground for defend on your head!

In this funny game the main purpose is hit your enemies head and defend your head from punches.


- Customize your players. You can unlock many forms with your earned golds or via watching videos.

- Play against with a friend or try to your skills vs Hard CPU.


Click one button, punch and make some score!
summary: Cubic Boxing is a fully physics based, one-button funny 3D Boxing game.
title: Cubic Boxing 3D

descriptionHTML:

Talk to any of the members and they will talk with you back. Select among many different chat options to choose between various story lines. Call each member to hear them talk to you.

- Ability to call and receive calls from members
- Customizable ringtone
- Customizable themes
- Customizable options, including: dialog speed, personal name, bias selection
- BTS members can send personal pictures to you

Enjoy!

In this NewBorn Baby and Mommy game, Kitty mommy will give birth to her baby very soon and this time she needs your attention. So are you ready to help her? comments: How to ruin a game with an upgrade. I enjoyed this game at first but now I would rather use vagiclean for toothpaste than spend any money on this. The titan clash is a waste of time with the amount of attacks it takes to defeat it and the time it takes to replenish your lives the titan always escapes. Everything is rigged from the puzzle board to the PvP battles. Upgrading has become ridiculous with the amount of time. You just want money for everything. Another game ruined by greed.

Fun game. Wish Dragon's didn't escape so easily. More 3-5 star heroes in daily summons would be nice. Hard to assend 4-5 hero's,for their last chevron. Make items for such things easier to get. Have a four star,8 weeks missing 1 item. Played the raids,titan hunts and everything else. Still short the same item.

Only been playing for a short time but so far it seems very enjoyable. At the moment I can play for free and seem to be progressing. I have noticed a few ridiculously hard levels. I'm not going to pay to win so I had to spend a while building health potions which gets repetitive. Apart from that it's fun over all.

I've been playing this game for sorry one year now and I do like it but it has a few flaws.  It takes a very long time to level up heroes, it's very hard to get good heroes because it's just by chance, and you don't get very many gems at a time if you want to get anywhere in this game you have to spend money.  Now they have a VIP 4.99 for a month you get 30 gems a day, and extra regular summon, and instead of just be able to upgrade one building at a time you can do two at a time.  It really is helping me get all my buildings to the same level. There is also alliance wars now and they also have challenges.  With a few tweaks I would give this game 5 stars hands down.  I definitely recommend it.

Great if you buy your way through the game. The fun lasts a few hours and then it's an endless grind of frustration. You won't get any better characters unless you purchase them with microtransactions and will lose....... A LOT.  Greed wins and the sheep that can throw their money at a mobile game will triumph.
